sentence.idiomatic: Help me do up the back of my clothing.
I still haven't grasped the meaning of this text.
The rain is so heavy today, it's probably going to make the car dirty.
This one is too small, can you exchange it for a bigger one?
Let's not go to that place today, let's go to a different place to eat.
Could you change my seat to a window seat?
She got a new perm, it looks really good.
Have you ironed those two pieces of clothing?
Yesterday I went to eat hotpot, I burned my lips off.
Did you bring an umbrella? It looks like it's going to rain any second.
When you wear that clothing you look ten years younger.
The expression on his face isn't too nice today--he doesn't look very happy.
Will wearing this make me look older than I am?
Wearing this style of shoe looks a little old-fashioned.
Dressing up like this is very fashionable. It doesn't look old-fashioned.
Drinking too much alcohol harms the body.
These hassles really boggle the mind.
Always staring at the computer really hurts your eyes, doesn't it?
To make things more convenient for his son's studies he moved near the school.
In order to study Chinese, he bought an MP3 player.
Didn't I do it all for you?
Hello, what would you like done to your hair?
I want to change the style. Do you think if I got a perm it would look good? Or would it look old-fashioned?
I think you can get some loose curls. It would really suit your shape of face, it won't look old-fashioned.
How about perming it straight, what do you think?
If you had straight hair you'd look too dull. Actually, you could get some highlights done, it would look really nice.
Getting both a perm and highlights--would it damage my hair too much?
We can do a conditioning treatment and it will be fine.
I have done that before, it didn't seem to help.
How could that be? It must have been a problem with the product they used.
I got it done here at your shop last time.
Well, then this time we'll use a better one. Plus after you perm your hair it will be very dry, you must do a conditioning treatment.
Of course you would say that.
Miss, I am saying it because it's good for your hair. If you don't want to do it, it's fine too.
All right. If I get a perm, highlights and conditioning treatment, give me a bit more of a discount.
No problem. Let's first get your hair washed.
